Name: Piano
Description: The pinnacle of Edea's professional line, the Piano boot represents the ultimate fusion of innovation and craftsmanship. Featuring premium microfiber construction with strategic leather reinforcement, it delivers unprecedented stability for quad jumps while maintaining exceptional lightness. Its anatomically engineered shape provides superior ankle support and perfect weight distribution for optimal control during technical elements.

Name: Ice Fly
Description: Trusted by elite competitors worldwide, the Ice Fly combines advanced thermal regulation with precision support. Its innovative dual-density construction adapts to your foot's natural movement while maintaining rigid support where needed. The boot's specialized moisture-wicking lining and anatomical padding ensure maximum comfort during intense training sessions.

Name: Concerto
Description: Designed for advancing competitive skaters, the Concerto offers an ideal balance of flexibility and support. Its progressive flex pattern accommodates double jumps while providing the stability needed for complex spin positions. The boot features Edea's signature anatomical heel lock and reinforced ankle support system.

Name: Chorus
Description: Perfect for dedicated intermediate skaters, the Chorus delivers reliable performance with enhanced comfort. The boot's semi-rigid structure provides excellent support for single and double jumps, while its memory foam padding system ensures a custom-like fit. Features quick-dry moisture management and anti-bacterial treatment.

Name: Flamenco Ice
Description: The Flamenco Ice combines style with functionality for recreational and beginning competitive skaters. Its moderately firm support system helps maintain proper alignment during basic jumps and spins. The boot's streamlined design includes extra padding in key pressure points and a breathable liner for extended comfort.

Name: Overture
Description: An excellent entry point into quality figure skating boots, the Overture provides essential support for developing fundamentals. Its flexible yet supportive structure helps beginners maintain proper form while learning basic techniques. Features include extra ankle padding and a user-friendly lacing system ideal for young skaters.

Name: Royal Prime White
Description: The Royal Prime in classic white exemplifies Italian craftsmanship with modern performance features. Its advanced composite construction provides excellent response for competitive elements while maintaining optimal temperature regulation. The anatomical last ensures precise fit with special attention to arch support and heel lock.

Name: Royal Prime Black
Description: The Royal Prime in classic white exemplifies Italian craftsmanship with modern performance features. Its advanced composite construction provides excellent response for competitive elements while maintaining optimal temperature regulation. The anatomical last ensures precise fit with special attention to arch support and heel lock.

Name: Rf1 Elite White
Description: The emblem of years of Risport tradition, has been redesign! The new RF 1 ELITE, with the highest quality leather, is made for those figure skating at a professional and competitive level.

Name: Rf1 Elite Black
Description: The emblem of years of Risport tradition, has been redesign! The new RF 1 ELITE, with the highest quality leather, is made for those figure skating at a professional and competitive level.

Name: Royal Pro White
Description: Made with light materials and a high technological content (microfibre) that make it the lightest skate on the market today, it proudly reflects the aesthetic lines of the Dance model that has graced the winners’ podiums at the World Championships and the Olympics.

Name: Royal Pro Black
Description: Made with light materials and a high technological content (microfibre) that make it the lightest skate on the market today, it proudly reflects the aesthetic lines of the Dance model that has graced the winners’ podiums at the World Championships and the Olympics.

Name: Rf3 Pro White
Description: Introducing the new RF 3 PRO with some aesthetic news (same shape), designed to bring all the features of the RF 1 ELITE model to young professionals. This skate supports their professional and physical growth, offering exceptional comfort and high-level performance.

Name: Rf3 Pro Black
Description: Introducing the new RF 3 PRO with some aesthetic news (same shape), designed to bring all the features of the RF 1 ELITE model to young professionals. This skate supports their professional and physical growth, offering exceptional comfort and high-level performance.

Name: Dance Prime White
Description: Dance Prime is the brand-new model created by Risport that meets the needs of all high-level athletes, guaranteeing them the best performance.

Name: Dance Prime Black
Description: Dance Prime is the brand-new model created by Risport that meets the needs of all high-level athletes, guaranteeing them the best performance.

Name: Turchese White
Description: This is Risport’s entry-level model for dance, made with natural materials that can guarantee excellent performance in this discipline. It is designed for dance and group athletes who are beginning to approach the speciality professionally.

Name: Turchese Black
Description: This is Risport’s entry-level model for dance, made with natural materials that can guarantee excellent performance in this discipline. It is designed for dance and group athletes who are beginning to approach the speciality professionally.

Name: Electra White
Description: We are thrilled to announce the redesign of one of our Risport’s best sellers: the new Electra Light is now available!

Name: Electra Black
Description: We are thrilled to announce the redesign of one of our Risport’s best sellers: the new Electra Light is now available!

Name: Antares White
Description: The ideal model for all young skaters who are improving their technique and want to make a greater commitment by tackling their first single jumps, and for amateurs who want to get serious.

Name: Antares Black
Description: The ideal model for all young skaters who are improving their technique and want to make a greater commitment by tackling their first single jumps, and for amateurs who want to get serious.

Name: Advanced Synergy Series DJ 6075
Description: The Synergy Boot was developed using a proprietary blend of high performance materials. Utilizing a high pressure/high temperature molding process exclusive to Jackson, the resulting boot is incredibly light, very strong, with exceptional heat molding properties. This Synergistic process combined with the Jackson Wrap and Flex Notch design creates a responsiveness never before seen in the industry.

Name: Advanced Synergy Series DJ 6060F Elite Fusion
Description: The Synergy Boot was developed using a proprietary blend of high performance materials. Utilizing a high pressure/high temperature molding process exclusive to Jackson, the resulting boot is incredibly light, very strong, with exceptional heat molding properties. This Synergistic process combined with the Jackson Wrap and Flex Notch design creates a responsiveness never before seen in the industry.

Name: Advanced Synergy Series DJ 5300 Supreme 5300
Description: The Synergy Boot was developed using a proprietary blend of high performance materials. Utilizing a high pressure/high temperature molding process exclusive to Jackson, the resulting boot is incredibly light, very strong, with exceptional heat molding properties. This Synergistic process combined with the Jackson Wrap and Flex Notch design creates a responsiveness never before seen in the industry.

Name: 2000Series Fusion Soles FS2800 Premier
Description: Our flagship technology, we design boots to fit tight when cold. With Jackson's Heat Moldable Fit System, your Skate Technician uses heat to soften and mold the boots. As the boot cools, it retains the shape of your foot.

Name: 2000Series Fusion Soles JE2450 Debut
Description: Our flagship technology, we design boots to fit tight when cold. With Jackson's Heat Moldable Fit System, your Skate Technician uses heat to soften and mold the boots. As the boot cools, it retains the shape of your foot.

Name: 2000Series Fusion Soles FS2430 Debut Lowcut
Description: Our flagship technology, we design boots to fit tight when cold. With Jackson's Heat Moldable Fit System, your Skate Technician uses heat to soften and mold the boots. As the boot cools, it retains the shape of your foot.

Name: 2000Series Fusion Soles FS2000 Flex
Description: Our flagship technology, we design boots to fit tight when cold. With Jackson's Heat Moldable Fit System, your Skate Technician uses heat to soften and mold the boots. As the boot cools, it retains the shape of your foot.

Name: Gold Seal Revolution
Description: The Gold Seal Revolution retains all the qualities of the traditional blade but now benefits from carbon fibre technology with extra flexibility and weight reduction. The new benchmark for free skaters is here.

Name: Pattern 99 Revolution
Description: The Pattern 99 Revolution is what happens when you let time-honoured craftsmen take the highest quality blade and fuse it with carbon fibre technology. The result is without comparison - this is simply the finest lightweight precision blade on the planet.

Name: Gold Seal
Description: The Gold Seal won more Olympic medals than any other model at PyeongChang 2018. Coincidence? We think not. Perhaps the most widely recommended blade by Russian coaches, this blade delivers for freestyle and pairs skaters seeking an optimal spinning experience. Due to its higher heel stanchion, unique compound radius and tapered/hollow ground features, skaters report experiencing effortless spins and control in their footwork sequences and edge jumps. Trusted and worn by Evgenia Medvedeva.

Name: Pattern 99
Description: The Pattern 99 blade is no stranger to the podium. It is one of the most popular profiles in the world as it consistently delivers maximum performance to high-end freestyle skaters. The primary 8 ft radius works wonderfully for skaters who use the Pattern 99’s tapered top toe pick for precision toe spotting on explosive jumps. This blade is ‘the real McCoy’ – it’s not comparable to anything, it’s not similar to anything, it’s the original. If you’re emerging as an elite level skater with powerful jumps and seek more control by being lower to the ice, this blade is undoubtedly your best option in our range.

Name: Coronation Ace Lite
Description: Based on the most popular developmental blade in the World. The Coronation Ace Lite will help develop skills up to double lutz, utilising the same 7ft rocker profile and coarse cross-cut tooth configuration as the traditional Coronation Ace but with the added benefit of a thinner blade allowing for quicker change of edge and improved glide. It also features new ‘Tuff’ plates that are lighter and 2X as strong as traditional options. The modern design of the Coronation Ace Lite was inspired by the ground-breaking and record-setting results of the Carbon fibre Revolution series

Name: Coronation Ace
Description: No other blade on the market can match the legendary performance and value of this fantastic blade. A skater moving up in skill will appreciate the responsiveness of the 7 ft rocker profile and, due to its coarse cross-cut tooth configuration, this option is highly recommended by international coaches for its reliability when learning new components. It is precision hardened to offer a strong skating edge and was used by many Olympic, World and National Champions early in their careers. If you are leaving a boot/blade combination set and plan on developing your axel and double jumps, this is our recommended option.

Name: Coronation Dance
Description: The Coronation Dance is John Wilson’s premier dance and synchronized skating option. This blade has a shorter heel to avoid clashing during Mohawks and Choctaws and will also eliminate any unnecessary trip-ups while synchro teams perform in tight formations. The coarse cross-cut picks are widely popular and are identical to the Coronation Ace toe picks which give this blade a lot of versatility as the demands of both dance and synchronized skating continue to develop.

Name: Professional
Description: he MK Professional is widely acclaimed for its balance, performance and style. A parallel sided blade, the Professional is the premier choice of coaches around the world for their experienced freestyle students who are working on their axel up to the double lutz jump.The elongated 7 ft rocker profile has minimal blade contact with the ice while performing spins, allowing you to create less friction for a faster and longer spin.

Name: Professional Lite
Description: The Professional Lite is the recommended choice from coaches around the world for skaters developing skills up to double lutz. Mirroring the lightweight carbon fibre Revolution series, the Professional Lite design offers a high-performance aesthetic aimed at future champions. We’ve thinned down the runner to allow for quicker edge change and improved glide while keeping the trusty 7ft rocker profile and cross-cut picks you love. It also features our new ‘Tuff’ plate design which is lighter and 2X as strong as traditional options.

Name: Dance
Description: When it comes to dance blades, look no further than the podiums to make an educated decision. At Pyeongchang 2018, 85% of allOlympic Ice Dance athletes used the MK Dance for its slimline design, allowing the skater to move from one edge to the other much quicker. Essentially, the unique configuration of this blade allows skaters the advantage of employing less body lean to change their edges.It is because of this that the Dance is also worn by the world’s elite synchronized skating teams. This is the choice of champions.

Name: Matrix Nova
Description: Maintaining the features of our Matrix blade that make it the best blade on the market, including a lightweight Aircraft Grade aluminum chassis, extremely strong Japanese AUS8 Stainless Steel runner, and superior edge control with a tapered edge, you can now replace the runners in a matter of seconds!

Name: Matrix Supreme
Description: Maintaining the features of our Matrix blade that make it the best blade on the market, including a lightweight Aircraft Grade aluminum chassis, extremely strong Japanese AUS8 Stainless Steel runner, and superior edge control with a tapered edge, you can now replace the runners in a matter of seconds!

Name: Matrix Freestyle
Description: Maintaining the features of our Matrix blade that make it the best blade on the market, including a lightweight Aircraft Grade aluminum chassis, extremely strong Japanese AUS8 Stainless Steel runner, and superior edge control with a tapered edge, you can now replace the runners in a matter of seconds!

Name: Matrix Elite
Description: Maintaining the features of our Matrix blade that make it the best blade on the market, including a lightweight Aircraft Grade aluminum chassis, extremely strong Japanese AUS8 Stainless Steel runner, and superior edge control with a tapered edge, you can now replace the runners in a matter of seconds!

Name: Matrix Legacy
Description: Maintaining the features of our Matrix blade that make it the best blade on the market, including a lightweight Aircraft Grade aluminum chassis, extremely strong Japanese AUS8 Stainless Steel runner, and superior edge control with a tapered edge, you can now replace the runners in a matter of seconds!

Name: E-Guards Basic
Description: No fiddling, no parts, simply snap on and walk off! The rubberized material and design means they fit any blade type.

Name: E-Guards Duo
Description: Still designed to protect the blade more.

Name: Maxi Animale Blade Buddies
Description: After skating, unlace your boots properly, wipe the blades down and put on soft blade guards. Our oversized maxi blade buddies add a smile to your skate care.

Name: E-gloves Pro
Description: Non-slip design on palm. Extra warm technical material to ensure warm trainings.

Name: E-gloves Anti Cut
Description: The first cut-resistant glove specifically designed for figure skating! They are made with a special anti-cut material on palm and fingers to protect your hands.

Name: Gripping Gloves
Description: Designed for ice skating with rubber dots integrated onto the palm for better grip.

Name: Socks
Description: Socks designed for skating, seamless, no creasing and more feel. Non-crease material to reduce chafing and seamless toe section to reduce rubbing and other annoying sensations during jumps

Name: Eco-Fur Blade Covers
Description: After skating, wipe down your blades to stop them rusting. Putting on blade covers after wiping protects the edges of your skates and helps your blades last longer.

Name: Lace Straps
Description: The strong elastic insert keeps the laces tight, while allowing you to bend. It also hides the knot and keeps the laces tucked away.

Name: Dune Blade Covers
Description: Soft and padded with velvet exterior with a new stylish wave pattern, ideal for storing your blades.

Name: Iris Blade Covers
Description: Soft and padded, Iris soft blade covers are perfect to protect your blades after each use.

Name: Polish
Description: Liquid water based polish, easy to use, simply brush on and leave to dry. Covers scratches, scuffs and marks leaving boots like new.

Name: Odor Absorber
Description: Get more freshness with Edea’s ‘magic bag’. Designed to keep boots fresher, drier, odorless. Each absorber is 27cm long and 7cm wide to fit the boot perfectly.

Name: Laces
Description: Made with strong longitudinal fibers of carded polyester for right balance of strength and elasticity.

Name: Laces with Crystals
Description: Made with strong longitudinal fibers of carded polyester for right balance of strength and elasticity.

Name: Lace Puller
Description: It increases the hold of laces when you tie your boots and after allows you to unlace more quickly.

Name: Libra Skate Bag
Description: Made from thick weave anti-tear polyester for durability. The opaque smooth finish prevents dirt becoming engrained.
